resources.string: "Age of Empires 2: Definitive Edition" Â© Microsoft Corporation. "AoE2DE Counters" was created under Microsoft\'s "Game Content Usage Rules" using assets from "Age of Empires 2: Definitive Edition", and it is not endorsed by or affiliated with Microsoft.
British unique unit. Powerful archer with long range.
Byzantine unique unit. Heavily armored cavalry.
Celtic unique unit. Exceptionally quick infantry.
Chinese unique unit. Archer with mediocre range. Fires large number of arrows very quickly.
Frankish unique unit. Infantry with ranged attack.
Gothic unique unit. Infantry with substantial pierce armor, virtually immune to archer fire.
Japanese unique unit. Infantry with fast attack.
Mongol unique unit. Cavalry archer with attack bonus vs. siege weapons.
Persian unique unit. Slow, powerful, strong, and well-armored cavalry.
Saracen unique unit. Camel with hand-to-hand attack at distance. Excels vs. other mounted units.
Teutonic unique unit. Infantry with effective armor and slow but powerful attack.
Turkish unique unit. Hand Cannoneer with longer range and no minimum range. Powerful close attack, but inaccurate at range.
Viking unique unit. Infantry that slowly heals itself.
Viking unique unit. Fires multiple arrows.
Aztec unique unit. Attack bonus vs. other infantry.
Hun unique unit. Cavalry with attack bonus vs. buildings.
Korean unique unit. Heavily armored horse-drawn archer unit.
Korean unique unit. Slow, ironclad battleship used to destroy other ships at close range.
Mayan unique unit. Strong, fast, well-armored archer with less attack than other archers.
Spanish unique unit. Mounted Hand Cannoneer. Powerful close attack, but inaccurate at range.
Spanish unique unit. Mounted Monk. Converts enemy units and heals friendly units like Monks, but cannot pick up Relics.
